name: Detective Dino Beta
description:
URGENT Detective Dino needs your help in unfolding the crime that has taken place during the masquerade party. Join us on a crime busting adventure with our mouse and keyboard based mystery game. Fill your clue book and play awesome mini games that bring you closer to finding out who committed the crime. This Adventure is one you don't wanna miss out on it's a whole explosion of fun, it's DINOMITE.

Art by: Alexis

Script by: Taha

Programing/Unity Work by: Toriana(me)
